statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_description, agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT agent_id, expertise_level, workload FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT ticket_description, status FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id = 54321 ORDER BY expertise_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id = 123 ORDER BY workload DESC, expertise_level ASC
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, status FROM support_tickets WHERE expertise_level > 2 AND workload < 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT agent_id, AVG(workload) AS avg_workload FROM support_tickets GROUP BY agent_id HAVING AVG(workload) > 5
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_description LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status='open';
SELECT ticket_description, agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id=100;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, status FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, expertise_area FROM agents WHERE workload > 50 ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_id, expertise_area FROM agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, expertise_area FROM agents WHERE workload > 10;
SELECT ticket_description, agent_name, status FROM support_tickets JOIN agents ON support_tickets.agent_id = agents.agent_id ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, agent_name, workload FROM support_tickets JOIN agents ON support_tickets.agent_id = agents.agent_id WHERE ticket_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_description LIKE '%urgent%' AND status = 'Pending' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, description, status FROM SupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT agent_id, name, expertise FROM Agents ORDER BY name ASC, expertise DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, created_at FROM SupportTickets WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT agent_id, workload FROM Agents WHERE expertise = 'Networking' ORDER BY workload DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupportTickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT description, status FROM SupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.description, a.name FROM SupportTickets t JOIN Agents a ON t.agent_id = a.agent_id;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.description, a.name, ta.assignment_date FROM SupportTickets t JOIN Agents a ON t.agent_id = a.agent_id JOIN TicketAssignments ta ON t.ticket_id = ta.ticket_id;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.description, a.name FROM SupportTickets t LEFT JOIN Agents a ON t.agent_id = a.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, status FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, expertise FROM agents WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_assigned FROM assignments GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(pending_tickets) AS avg_pending_tickets FROM workloads;
SELECT * FROM tickets INNER JOIN assignments ON tickets.ticket_id = assignments.ticket_id
SELECT agent_name, expertise, is_available FROM agents WHERE is_available = TRUE
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, agent_name FROM tickets INNER JOIN assignments ON tickets.ticket_id = assignments.ticket_id INNER JOIN agents ON assignments.agent_id = agents.agent_id
SELECT ticket_description, status FROM tickets INNER JOIN assignments ON tickets.ticket_id = assignments.ticket_id WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT agent_id, SUM(total_tickets_assigned) AS total_assigned_tickets FROM workloads GROUP BY agent_id
SELECT * FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_id, name, expertise FROM agents WHERE workload > 10;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01' AND completion_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT agent_id, pending_tickets, resolved_tickets FROM workloads WHERE pending_tickets > resolved_tickets;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT agent_id, name, expertise FROM agents WHERE expertise='Technical Support' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%network%';
SELECT t.ticket_id, a.name AS agent_name, w.resolved_tickets FROM assignments AS a INNER JOIN agents AS a ON a.agent_id = a.agent_id INNER JOIN workloads AS w ON a.agent_id = w.agent_id;
SELECT a.name AS agent_name, COUNT(*) AS num_tickets FROM assignments AS a INNER JOIN agents AS a ON a.agent_id = a.agent_id GROUP BY a.name HAVING num_tickets > 5;
